org.epics.pvmanager.file

Interface FileFormat

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSVFileFormat, ImageFileFormat, JVTypeFileFormat, ListFileFormat

    public interface FileFormat
    A way to read and write an object with a particular file format.
    Author:
    carcassi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<String> getFileExtensions()
      The file extensions supported by this file format.
      boolean isWriteSupported()
      Whether writes are supported.
      Object readValue(InputStream in)
      Reads the value from the given stream.
      void writeValue(Object value, OutputStream out)
      Write the value to the given stream.

    • Method Detail

      • readValue

        Object readValue(InputStream in)
                 throws Exception
        Reads the value from the given stream.
        Parameters:
        in - a stream; not null
        Returns:
        the value de-serialized
        Throws:
        Exception - any error

      • writeValue

        void writeValue(Object value,
              OutputStream out)
                throws Exception
        Write the value to the given stream.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to write; not null
        out - the output stream; not null
        Throws:
        Exception - any error

      • isWriteSupported

        boolean isWriteSupported()
        Whether writes are supported.
        Returns:
        true if can serialize objects

      • getFileExtensions

        Collection<String> getFileExtensions()
        The file extensions supported by this file format.
        Returns:
        a non-empty set of file extensions
